SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_CMD# = 'kubectl &ACTION_NAME#'
!Server URL : IF &UC4RB_K8S_BASE_URL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_BASE_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --server &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Username : IF &UC4RB_K8S_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Password : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : IF &UC4RB_K8S_PASSWORD# <> "--10" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_K8S_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD") : ENDIF
!Kube Config Path : IF &UC4RB_K8S_CONFIG_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_CONFIG_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --kubeconfig &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Kube Config Context : IF &UC4RB_K8S_CONTEXT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_CONTEXT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --context &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Cluster : IF &UC4RB_K8S_CLUSTER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_CLUSTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --cluster &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Namespace : IF &UC4RB_K8S_NAMESPACE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_NAMESPACE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --namespace &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Skip TLS Verification : IF &UC4RB_K8S_SKIP_CERT# <> "NO" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_SKIP_CERT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --insecure-skip-tls-verify") :ENDIF
! Client Certificate Path : IF &UC4RB_K8S_CERT_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_K8S_CERT_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KUBERNETES.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " --certificate-authority &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
